analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS score 38 signals a Defensive regime as momentum pushed the score down from 40. A sharp 18% spike in VIX (Fear/Volatility) and rising DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity) reflect tightening financial conditions. While equity selling is heavy, stable High-Yield spreads suggest no systemic credit crisis yet. Prioritize capital preservation until VIX exhaustion signals a potential tactical bottom. Caution is mandatory in this regime.

reports.EN: GMS score 38 signals a Defensive regime as momentum pushed the score down from 40. A sharp 18% spike in VIX (Fear/Volatility) and rising DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity) reflect tightening financial conditions. While equity selling is heavy, stable High-Yield spreads suggest no systemic credit crisis yet. Prioritize capital preservation until VIX exhaustion signals a potential tactical bottom. Caution is mandatory in this regime.
reports.ES: El puntaje GMS 38 confirma un rÃ©gimen Defensivo, ya que el impulso negativo empujÃ³ el puntaje desde 40. El aumento del 18% en el VIX (Miedo/Volatilidad) y un DXY (Fortaleza del DÃ³lar/Liquidez) mÃ¡s alto reflejan una restricciÃ³n en la liquidez global. Aunque las acciones corrigen, la estabilidad en los diferenciales de bonos sugiere que no hay un colapso crediticio sistÃ©mico. Se recomienda la preservaciÃ³n de capital y precauciÃ³n extrema hasta que el VIX muestre signos de agotamiento tÃ¡ctico.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 38 mengonfirmasi rezim Defensif karena momentum mendorong skor turun dari level 40. Lonjakan 18% pada VIX (Ketakutan/Volatilitas) dan penguatan DXY (Kekuatan Dolar/Likuiditas) mencerminkan pengetatan kondisi pasar yang nyata. Meskipun pasar ekuitas mengalami tekanan jual tajam, spread obligasi yang tetap stabil menunjukkan belum ada krisis kredit sistemik. Investor disarankan memprioritaskan pelestarian modal hingga indikator VIX mencapai puncaknya dan stabil.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score von 38 bestÃ¤tigt ein defensives Marktumfeld, nachdem das Momentum den Wert von 40 nach unten gedrÃ¼ckt hat. Ein massiver Anstieg des VIX (Angst/VolatilitÃ¤t) um 18 % sowie ein stÃ¤rkerer DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke/LiquiditÃ¤t) belasten die LiquiditÃ¤t erheblich. Trotz der Korrekturen bei Aktien deutet die StabilitÃ¤t der High-Yield-Spreads darauf hin, dass keine systemische Kreditkrise vorliegt. Anleger sollten den Kapitalerhalt priorisieren, bis die VolatilitÃ¤t ihren HÃ¶hepunkt erreicht hat.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 38 confirme un rÃ©gime dÃ©fensif, le momentum ayant poussÃ© la valeur sous le seuil de 40. Une poussÃ©e de 18 % du VIX (Peur/VolatilitÃ©) associÃ©e Ã  un DXY (Force du dollar/LiquiditÃ©) en hausse reflÃ¨te un resserrement des conditions financiÃ¨res. Bien que les actions subissent des ventes, la stabilitÃ© des spreads de crÃ©dit indique qu'il n'y a pas encore de crise systÃ©mique majeure. La prÃ©servation du capital doit Ãªtre privilÃ©giÃ©e jusqu'Ã  ce que le VIX montre des signes de stabilisation.
